survey_name: Telehealth Service Adoption and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels with telehealth services, including usage frequency, perceived benefits, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often have you used telehealth services in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often have you used telehealth services in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: What type of healthcare provider have you consulted via telehealth? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected '1-2 times' or more in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'
